comments.name: jsicuran

comments.html:
LLDP will give you more information, but you really don't need to use it for this. The regular mac address table mibs will tell you what nodes are connected to what ports. Combined with the arp table you can map ip/mac to a switch port.

snmp::info has modules for doing this as well, but I use netdisco(which uses snmp::info) which dumps everything into a sql database. This makes doing things like generating your network topology a piece of cake.
